thread.section_title: Hotel Basss by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel! - Review of Hotel Basss by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Henkebenke
title: Wonderful hotel!
text:
We stayed at Hotel Basss for 4 nights and we were very happy with our stay there. Lovely and helpful people who work there, nice modern lobby, clean room with a nice soft bed.
The breakfast was perfect, and included coffee, juices, baguettes, bread, pancakes, yoghurt, m√ºsli, croissants (choco and regular), and a wide variety of jams, ham, salami and nutella.
The free coffee and snacks every afternoon was a nice and welcome touch!
